'''Edubuntu''' is a member of the [[Ubuntu (Linux distribution)|Ubuntu]] family of [[Linux distribution]]s which is designed for use in [[classroom]]s.
+
'''Edubuntu''' is a member of the [[Ubuntu (operating system)|Ubuntu]] family of [[Linux distribution]]s which is designed for use in [[classroom]]s.
Edubuntu has been developed in collaboration with teachers and technologists in multiple countries. Edubuntu is built on top of the Ubuntu base, and incorporates the [[Linux Terminal Server Project|LTSP]] [[thin client]] architecture, as well as education-specific applications, aimed at the 6-18 years age group.
Edubuntu has been developed in collaboration with teachers and technologists in multiple countries. Edubuntu is built on top of the Ubuntu base, and incorporates the [[Linux Terminal Server Project|LTSP]] [[thin client]] architecture, as well as education-specific applications, aimed at the 6-18 years age group.
